text: Megalobrimus scutellatus is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Per Olof Christopher Aurivillius in 1916. It is known from Tanzania and Malawi.BioLib.cz - Megalobrimus scutellatus. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Phrissomini Category:Beetles described in 1916
title: Megalobrimus scutellatus
